trans-unit.source: Document Layout Fields

seg-source.mrk: Document Layout Fields

trans-unit.source: Document Layout Fields are the fields that get printed for each Section. Here the position along with the content and format of the fields are specified.

seg-source.mrk: Document Layout Fields are the fields that get printed for each Section.
Here the position along with the content and format of the fields are specified.

trans-unit.source: : Document Layout Fields

seg-source.mrk: : Document Layout Fields

trans-unit.source: The fields on this page are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on this page are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Field

seg-source.mrk: Field

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Line

seg-source.mrk: Line

trans-unit.source: Indicates on what line the field should be printed on in the section.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates on what line the field should be printed on in the section.

trans-unit.source: Indentation (pt)

seg-source.mrk: Indentation (pt)

trans-unit.source: Indicates the indentation of the field (e.g. the horizontal position); specified in pt.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the indentation of the field (e.g. the horizontal position); specified in pt.

trans-unit.source: Group Code

seg-source.mrk: Group Code

trans-unit.source: Identifies a grouping of fields that should be moved together. When changing the Line or Indentation (pt) of a grouped field, the system will also automatically update all the other fields with the same Group Code within the layout. Using this field is optional.

seg-source.mrk: Identifies a grouping of fields that should be moved together.
When changing the Line or Indentation (pt) of a grouped field, the system will also automatically update all the other fields with the same Group Code within the layout.
Using this field is optional.

trans-unit.source: The Group Code functionality is per Document Layout, meaning that fields in different sections can be grouped. This allows for e.g., grouping the fields in the header of the lines with the fields on the lines, so that when a field on a line is moved right or left the corresponding header is also moved.

seg-source.mrk: The Group Code functionality is per Document Layout, meaning that fields in different sections can be grouped.
This allows for e.g., grouping the fields in the header of the lines with the fields on the lines, so that when a field on a line is moved right or left the corresponding header is also moved.

trans-unit.source: Field Width (pt)

seg-source.mrk: Field Width (pt)

trans-unit.source: Indicates the length of the field. Mandatory for fields that are right or center aligned and for fields where line breaks are allowed; specified in pt.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the length of the field.
Mandatory for fields that are right or center aligned and for fields where line breaks are allowed; specified in pt.

trans-unit.source: Alignment

seg-source.mrk: Alignment

trans-unit.source: Indicates the position of the content of the field. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the position of the content of the field.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: Left – The field is printed left aligned.

seg-source.mrk: Left – The field is printed left aligned.

trans-unit.source: Center – The content of the field is centered. This option requires a value in the Field Width (pt) field.

seg-source.mrk: Center – The content of the field is centered.
This option requires a value in the Field Width (pt) field.

trans-unit.source: Right – The content of the field is right aligned. This option requires a value in the Field Width (pt) field.

seg-source.mrk: Right – The content of the field is right aligned.
This option requires a value in the Field Width (pt) field.

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Short description of the field. This field is optional but makes it easier to identify the purpose of each line.

seg-source.mrk: Short description of the field.
This field is optional but makes it easier to identify the purpose of each line.

trans-unit.source: Type

seg-source.mrk: Type

trans-unit.source: Defines how the system should assign the value to the field. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Defines how the system should assign the value to the field.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: Value – The field is based on a value from a field in a table. The table and field are specified in the Table No. and Field No. fields.

seg-source.mrk: Value – The field is based on a value from a field in a table.
The table and field are specified in the Table No.
and Field No.
fields.

trans-unit.source: Caption – The field is based on a caption from a field in a table. The table and field are specified in the Table No. and Field No. fields.

seg-source.mrk: Caption – The field is based on a caption from a field in a table.
The table and field are specified in the Table No.
and Field No.
fields.

trans-unit.source: Text – The field gets its value from what is entered in the Text field.

seg-source.mrk: Text – The field gets its value from what is entered in the Text field.

trans-unit.source: Document Text – The field gets it value from a predefined Document Text specified in the Document Text Code field.

seg-source.mrk: Document Text – The field gets it value from a predefined Document Text specified in the Document Text Code field.

trans-unit.source: System – The value is a system value. The value is specified in the System Value field.

seg-source.mrk: System – The value is a system value.
The value is specified in the System Value field.

trans-unit.source: Subreport (via cc|formatted documents) – Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Document Layouts_FD.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Document Layouts with cc|formatted documents” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

seg-source.mrk: Subreport (via cc|formatted documents) – Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Document Layouts_FD.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Document Layouts with cc|formatted documents” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Table No.

seg-source.mrk: Table No.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the table that is used to get the value for the field. This field is only used if the Type = Value or Caption.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the table that is used to get the value for the field.
This field is only used if the Type = Value or Caption.

trans-unit.source: Table Name

seg-source.mrk: Table Name

trans-unit.source: Displays the name of the table.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the name of the table.

trans-unit.source: Field No.

seg-source.mrk: Field No.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the field from which the value should come. This field is only used if the Type = Value or Caption.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the field from which the value should come.
This field is only used if the Type = Value or Caption.

trans-unit.source: Field Name

seg-source.mrk: Field Name

trans-unit.source: Displays the name of the field.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the name of the field.

trans-unit.source: Text

seg-source.mrk: Text

trans-unit.source: Indicates the text that will be printed if the Type = Text.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the text that will be printed if the Type = Text.

trans-unit.source: Variables can be entered into this field. HTML tags can be used as well (refer to https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc645967.aspx to find supported tags).

seg-source.mrk: Variables can be entered into this field.
HTML tags can be used as well (refer to https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc645967.aspx to find supported tags).

trans-unit.source: Document Text Code

seg-source.mrk: Document Text Code

trans-unit.source: Identifies the code for the Document Text that will be used for the field.

seg-source.mrk: Identifies the code for the Document Text that will be used for the field.

trans-unit.source: System Value

seg-source.mrk: System Value

trans-unit.source: Indicates the system value to use if the Type = System. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the system value to use if the Type = System.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: User ID – User ID logged into the system.

seg-source.mrk: User ID – User ID logged into the system.

trans-unit.source: Today – Today’s day (based on the operative system).

seg-source.mrk: Today – Today’s day (based on the operative system).

trans-unit.source: Workdate – Workdate according to the Microsoft Dynamics NAV Client.

seg-source.mrk: Workdate – Workdate according to the Microsoft Dynamics NAV Client.

trans-unit.source: User Language – Language of which the Client is running.

seg-source.mrk: User Language – Language of which the Client is running.

trans-unit.source: Time – Current time (based on the operative system).

seg-source.mrk: Time – Current time (based on the operative system).

trans-unit.source: Company Name – Name of the company into which the user is logged.

seg-source.mrk: Company Name – Name of the company into which the user is logged.

trans-unit.source: Blank Zero

seg-source.mrk: Blank Zero

trans-unit.source: Determines if the system should print zeros for this field or not.

seg-source.mrk: Determines if the system should print zeros for this field or not.

trans-unit.source: Skip if Blank

seg-source.mrk: Skip if Blank

trans-unit.source: Determines if the system should skip printing a blank field or not. Skipping a blank field will leave space for other fields to be printed.

seg-source.mrk: Determines if the system should skip printing a blank field or not.
Skipping a blank field will leave space for other fields to be printed.

trans-unit.source: Allow Line Break

seg-source.mrk: Allow Line Break

trans-unit.source: Determines if the line should carry over and continue one line down if the content it longer then the field length. This option requires a value in the Field Width (pt) field. When breaking a line, the system will always try to do the line break at a space if possible (instead of in the middle of the word).

seg-source.mrk: Determines if the line should carry over and continue one line down if the content it longer then the field length.
This option requires a value in the Field Width (pt) field.
When breaking a line, the system will always try to do the line break at a space if possible (instead of in the middle of the word).

trans-unit.source: For FlowLayout reports, a line break will be made automatically if a field width is configured.

seg-source.mrk: For FlowLayout reports, a line break will be made automatically if a field width is configured.

trans-unit.source: Carry Over

seg-source.mrk: Carry Over

trans-unit.source: Determines if carry over values are used in the document. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Determines if carry over values are used in the document.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: Create – used to identify the field for which to summarize/create the carry over (for example “Line Amount” in documents). Only one field inside the document layout can have this value. Furthermore, the field Type must be Decimal.

seg-source.mrk: Create – used to identify the field for which to summarize/create the carry over (for example “Line Amount” in documents).
Only one field inside the document layout can have this value.
Furthermore, the field Type must be Decimal.

trans-unit.source: End – used to finish the summarizing. Multiple fields inside the document layout can have this value (for example “Total Text Value” in documents). The first occurrence when running the report will stop to summarize the value.

seg-source.mrk: End – used to finish the summarizing.
Multiple fields inside the document layout can have this value (for example “Total Text Value” in documents).
The first occurrence when running the report will stop to summarize the value.

trans-unit.source: Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Add Carry Overs for Document Sums.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Add Carry Overs for Document Sums” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

seg-source.mrk: Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Add Carry Overs for Document Sums.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Add Carry Overs for Document Sums” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Rounding

seg-source.mrk: Rounding

trans-unit.source: Indicates the rounding precision for numeric values.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the rounding precision for numeric values.

trans-unit.source: Format String

seg-source.mrk: Format String

trans-unit.source: Indicates the format in which the value should be displayed. If the value is a decimal value, the Format String can be used to set the number of decimals, etc.; if the value is a date value, the Format String can be used to set the date format.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the format in which the value should be displayed.
If the value is a decimal value, the Format String can be used to set the number of decimals, etc.; if the value is a date value, the Format String can be used to set the date format.

trans-unit.source: Refer to online help for information about specifying different formats.

seg-source.mrk: Refer to online help for information about specifying different formats.

trans-unit.source: Uppercase

seg-source.mrk: Uppercase

trans-unit.source: Determines if the field will be uppercase.

seg-source.mrk: Determines if the field will be uppercase.

trans-unit.source: Last Record

seg-source.mrk: Last Record

trans-unit.source: If selected, the system will use the values from the last record (instead of the first) if there is more than one record within the filter.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, the system will use the values from the last record (instead of the first) if there is more than one record within the filter.

trans-unit.source: Fore Color

seg-source.mrk: Fore Color

trans-unit.source: Indicates the color of the foreground for the field.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the color of the foreground for the field.

trans-unit.source: Font Style

seg-source.mrk: Font Style

trans-unit.source: Indicates the Font Style for the field. The options are Normal and Italic.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the Font Style for the field.
The options are Normal and Italic.

trans-unit.source: Font Family

seg-source.mrk: Font Family

trans-unit.source: Indicates the Font Family for the field. If this field is empty, the system will use the value in the Font Family field in the header of the Document Layout.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the Font Family for the field.
If this field is empty, the system will use the value in the Font Family field in the header of the Document Layout.

trans-unit.source: Font Size

seg-source.mrk: Font Size

trans-unit.source: Indicates the Font Size for the field. If this field is empty, the system will use the value in the Font Size field in the header of the Document Layout.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the Font Size for the field.
If this field is empty, the system will use the value in the Font Size field in the header of the Document Layout.

trans-unit.source: Font Weight

seg-source.mrk: Font Weight

trans-unit.source: Indicates the Font Weight for the field (bold, extra bold, light, etc.).

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the Font Weight for the field (bold, extra bold, light, etc.).

trans-unit.source: Text Decoration

seg-source.mrk: Text Decoration

trans-unit.source: Indicates the Font Decoration for the field (underline, overline, etc.).

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the Font Decoration for the field (underline, overline, etc.).

trans-unit.source: Vertical Alignment

seg-source.mrk: Vertical Alignment

trans-unit.source: Indicates the vertical alignment of the field. The options are Top and Middle.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the vertical alignment of the field.
The options are Top and Middle.

trans-unit.source: For FlowLayout reports, the vertical alignment is automatically set to Top.

seg-source.mrk: For FlowLayout reports, the vertical alignment is automatically set to Top.

trans-unit.source: BLOB Field Usage

seg-source.mrk: BLOB Field Usage

trans-unit.source: Defines the rendering of a BLOB field. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Defines the rendering of a BLOB field.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: Ignore – Option for all fields that are not BLOB fields.

seg-source.mrk: Ignore – Option for all fields that are not BLOB fields.

trans-unit.source: Image – The BLOB field will be rendered as a picture. This option only works in combination with flow layouts, not with the classic layouts.

seg-source.mrk: Image – The BLOB field will be rendered as a picture.
This option only works in combination with flow layouts, not with the classic layouts.

trans-unit.source: Formatted Documents – Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Document Layouts_FD.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Document Layouts with cc|formatted documents” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

seg-source.mrk: Formatted Documents – Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Document Layouts_FD.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Document Layouts with cc|formatted documents” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Subreport No.

seg-source.mrk: Subreport No.

trans-unit.source: Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Document Layouts_FD.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Document Layouts with cc|formatted documents” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

seg-source.mrk: Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Document Layouts_FD.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Document Layouts with cc|formatted documents” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

trans-unit.source: No. of Filters

seg-source.mrk: No.
of Filters

trans-unit.source: Displays the number of filters set up for this field.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the number of filters set up for this field.

trans-unit.source: No. of Criteria

seg-source.mrk: No.
of Criteria

trans-unit.source: Displays the number of criteria set up for this field.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the number of criteria set up for this field.

trans-unit.source: The Home tab has four actions related to Document Layout Fields. Each action is described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The Home tab has four actions related to Document Layout Fields.
Each action is described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Action

seg-source.mrk: Action

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Set Field Widths

seg-source.mrk: Set Field Widths

trans-unit.source: Automatically populates the Field Width (pt) field of all lines in the section.

seg-source.mrk: Automatically populates the Field Width (pt) field of all lines in the section.

trans-unit.source: The system will calculate the width based on the Indentation (pt) of the next field on the same line and subtract it with the Column Margin (pt) specified when running the function.

seg-source.mrk: The system will calculate the width based on the Indentation (pt) of the next field on the same line and subtract it with the Column Margin (pt) specified when running the function.

trans-unit.source: Run Report

seg-source.mrk: Run Report

trans-unit.source: Generates a printed output for testing the Document Layout configuration. This function uses the current Document Layout independent of its status (when running a report from another place in the system, the user can only select from certified layouts with the valid starting and ending dates).

seg-source.mrk: Generates a printed output for testing the Document Layout configuration.

This function uses the current Document Layout independent of its status (when running a report from another place in the system, the user can only select from certified layouts with the valid starting and ending dates).

trans-unit.source: Quick View Layout

seg-source.mrk: Quick View Layout

trans-unit.source: Generates a bitmap representation of the Document Layout using the first page of the last record in the database.

seg-source.mrk: Generates a bitmap representation of the Document Layout using the first page of the last record in the database.

trans-unit.source: Using this function when setting up a Document Layout is quicker than running the “Run Report” function.

seg-source.mrk: Using this function when setting up a Document Layout is quicker than running the “Run Report” function.

trans-unit.source: Quick View Field Positions

seg-source.mrk: Quick View Field Positions

trans-unit.source: Generates a bitmap representation of the document layout with each field showing the indentation, horizontal alignment and field width.

seg-source.mrk: Generates a bitmap representation of the document layout with each field showing the indentation, horizontal alignment and field width.
